member.name: T:Dxura.RP.Game.Cooldown
member.summary: Manages cooldown timers for game actions.

member.name: M:Dxura.RP.Game.Cooldown.ProcessCooldowns
member.summary: Checks for completed cooldowns at the end of each fixed update.

member.name: M:Dxura.RP.Game.Cooldown.IsOnCooldown(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a cooldown is currently active.
member.param: The unique identifier for the cooldown.
member.returns: True if the cooldown is active, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Dxura.RP.Game.Cooldown.StartCooldown(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Starts a cooldown with the specified duration.
member.param: The unique identifier for the cooldown.

member.name: M:Dxura.RP.Game.Cooldown.CancelCooldown(System.String)
member.summary: Cancels an active cooldown.
member.param: The unique identifier for the cooldown.

member.name: M:Dxura.RP.Game.Cooldown.GetRemainingTime(System.String)
member.summary: Get remaining cooldown time in seconds.
member.param: The unique identifier for the cooldown.
member.returns: The remaining time in seconds, or 0 if not on cooldown.

member.name: M:Dxura.RP.Game.Cooldown.CheckAndStartCooldown(System.String,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks if a cooldown is active and starts it if not.
member.param: The unique identifier for the cooldown.
If the user should be notified for this cooldown
member.returns: True if the cooldown was already active, false if it was just started.
member.example: if (CooldownManager.Instance.CheckAndStartCooldown("ability_fireball", 5.0f)) return; // Cooldown is active, don't proceed
